participant_1.background:
I have always been close to my parents.
I am excited to explore my new city and find new ways to style my curly hair.
I will not fight back, but I will stand up for myself and others.
I enjoy making things for my pups and watching them enjoy them.
I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders.

participant_2.background:
I will be visiting the new natural history museum with my students.
i wish to buy a corvette when i retire.
I'm a home owner who can fix your computer.
I am a healthy weight.
i was adopted when i was a baby.

content.text: Hey! What's going on?
Not much, just getting ready to visit the new natural history museum with my students!
Oh cool! I love learning about new things. Where are you visiting from?
We live in the city, so it's not too far. What about you? Do you have any fun plans for this weekend?
I'm planning on staying home to avoid spiders. I have a pretty severe phobia, so I'm not taking any chances.
That's understandable. I used to be afraid of spiders too, but I got over it by slowly exposing myself to them.
I wish I could do that, but I'm not that brave. I'm just happy I'm not the only one who's afraid of them!
Yeah, it's not a very common phobia, but it's definitely real.
Well, I'm glad you're not going to let it stop you from enjoying your weekend.
Thanks! I'm going to try my best.
Have fun at the museum!
Thanks! I will!
What grade do you teach?
I teach third grade.
Oh, that's a fun age. I used to want to be a teacher when I was younger.
It's a great job! I love working with kids.
Do you have any plans for after you retire?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about buying a Corvette.
That would be awesome! I've always wanted to drive a Corvette.
Maybe we can take a road trip together sometime!
That would be fun
